snippet: More gains in industrial production and Chinese economic growth beyond expectations also encouraged investors.
abstract: Stock market advances for third straight session as Federal Reserve chairwoman Janet L Yellen reaffirms that Fed is committed to keeping interest rates low.
lead_paragraph: More gains in industrial production and Chinese economic growth beyond expectations also encouraged investors.

headline.main: Market Up 3rd Straight Day, as Fed Commits to Low Rates
headline.print_headline: Market Up 3rd Straight Day, as Fed Commits to Low Rates
